headline: CTSi, EXPANSIA, and JHNA Merge to Form Next-Generation Defense and Aerospace Technology Company
summary: John H. Northrop & Associates, ("JHNA"), Coherent Technical Services, ("CTSi"), and EXPANSIA Group, ("EXPANSIA") today announced their merger to form a new national defense technology company supporting warfighters, operators, and program offices through expertise in digital engineering, full-spectrum modeling and simulation, and advanced fabrication.
